name: MILF
description:
MILF is a game where you play a good looking female trying to collect gold to escape out of a disgusting place.
Move your way through different types of enemies, paths and more than 20 levels! Collect upgrades to make your journey easier.

Will you help the MILF to escape?

Press Z to jump and arrow keys to walk around, if you want to play in windowed borderless press "B"

Any feedback is always welcome on the forums, negative or positive I love feedback if I can do something with it.
